rules.description: Change Caps Lock to Hyper (Cmd+Opt+Ctl+Shift) ; Escape if pressed alone.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
PrtScn -> Screen capture to clipboard (+Ctl interactive)
ScrLk -> Mission Control; Ctl+ScrLk -> Lock Screen (shell script)
F2 -> Edit file name (Enter) in Finder
Hold (& release) Shift-Ctl -> Toggle mac os sticky keys (Shift x5; must be enabled in System Preferences)
Fn lock: Cmd-Opt-Ctl-Fn -> toggle Fn lock
Sticky Fn: Press Fn twice -> activate sticky Fn
NumPad media keys with NumLock OFF
